description:
Kuesu is determined to bind her family with Yuuto’s. When he continues to refuse her, what drastic measures will she take?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Los Sentimientos de Una Gata y La Melancolia de la Bruja
Neko no Omoi to Mahou Shoujo no Yuuutsu
The Cat`s Regard and the Magical Girl`s Melancholy
猫の想いと魔法少女のユウウツ
